summary:
The god of the 69 has granted her power down into a small sword named: Power Sword.
This is my first mod EVER, hope you like. you need to get tons of iron (20 ingots) Slay 5 trolls, and make a steel greatsword before getting this item. ((or find it in the riverwood trader.

Please report and bugs :)
descriptionHtml:
The god of the 69 has granted her power down into a small sword named: Power Sword.
This is my first mod EVER, hope you like. you need to get tons of iron (20 ingots) Slay 5 trolls, and make a steel greatsword before getting this item. ((or find it in the riverwood trader.
Please report any bugs :)
Pictures and a custom model would be loved, for i am only just starting the CK, and i will give you credit for them <3

PERMISSIONS
---------------
Feel free to use, edit, retexture, to your hearts desire. However Credit is apperciated. If you redmodel, please show me, I need a remodel, and i will give ya credit ;)
author: WGP1337
